content: {"name": "Loudoun Hunger", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Need appointment to receive food . https://services.loudounhunger.org/", "email": "", "url": "https://loudounhunger.org/get-help/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "750 Miller Drive Southeast", "address_2": null, "city": "Leesburg", "state_province": "VA", "postal_code": "20175", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.0827578, "longitude": -77.5550457}, "phones": [{"number": "(703) 777-5911", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:45"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:45"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:45"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:45"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:45"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "21:45", "closes_at": "23:20"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "21:45", "closes_at": "23:20"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required for all members of the household"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration on website required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
